author.name: Sohel Dhengre
author.bio: I'm a Software Engineer with over one year of experience. I have worked on variety of apps ranging from E-Learning, Utilities to Dating.

events.title: iOS Developer
events.subtitle: Antino Labs
points: Fixed bugs and added new features inDRA and SIMN applications
Participated in Intel IoT Hackathon and built a smart soul with knock sensor, Edison board and BLE

events.title: iOS Developer Intern
events.subtitle: Orion Infosolutions
points: Took Stanford University's CS193p (Developing Applications for iOS)
Built TBNEurope application from scratch and published to AppStore
Built Montcalm application from scratch and published to AppStore

events.title: Bachelor of Engineering
events.subtitle: G H Raisoni College Of Engineering, Nagpur

events.title: Copy And Paste
events.subtitle: iOS
events.overview: Copy & Paste is one stop solution for copy and paste anything across mutliple Apps. It is a very useful tool that simplifies Copy Paste on iPhone, for work purpose or personal usage!

events.title: Advanced Swift Workshop
events.subtitle: try! Swift, Bangalore
events.overview: Conducted a full day workshop on Advanced Swift Concepts
points: Functional Programming - Map, Filter and Reduce
Value vs Reference, Copy On Write
Memory Management - Memory Layout, Unsafe Swift

events.title: Progressive iOS Architectures
events.subtitle: Swift India @ PhonePe
events.overview: Talked about how to start with MVC and mix and match patterns like Coordinator, Interactor and Router as the complexity grows.

events.title: Library Oriented Programming
events.subtitle: Swift India @ Hike
events.overview: Talked about how to build and integrate libraries using Swift inside Xcode.

events.title: Networking using Restofire
events.subtitle: Swift India @ Hike
events.overview: Talked about Declarative Networking in Swift using Restofire

events.title: Networking using Restofire
events.subtitle: Thoughtworks, Gurgaon
events.overview: Talked about Declarative Networking in Swift using Restofire
